knimeNode.name: PDB Downloader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to allow download of multiple RCSB PDB filetypes from a column of RCSB Structure IDs

fullDescription.intro:
This node, and the corresponding source node, allows the downloading of structure and sequence files from the RCSB PDB . The formats supported are (not all formats are available for all structures!):
PDB
mmCIF
Structure Factors
PDBML
FASTA Format Sequence
NMR Restraints
NMR Restraints v2
NMR Chemical Shifts
PDB files are cast as PDB cells, and PDBML as XML cells. No checking the the structure IDs is carried out - invalid IDs will return cells containing missing values. WARNING - the PDBML option can result in very large tables!
This node was developed by Vernalis (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com
